Module hu.unipannon.virt.plot
Package hu.unipannon.virt.plot.data

Class ScatterData

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.unipannon.virt.plot.data.ScatterData
  • public class ScatterData
extends java.lang.Object
    Data class to store a line as two arrays of double. Works exactly like the Line class, with the exception of not containing the graphical line's parameters.
    Author:
    Tóth Bálint

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScatterData

        public ScatterData​(double[] xs,
                   double[] ys,
                   Marker.MarkerType marker,
                   double[] size,
                   javafx.scene.paint.Paint[] color)
        Constructs a ScatterData instance. xs and ys must be same size arrays.
        Parameters:
        xs - X coordinates of the series' points.
        ys - Y coordinates of the series' points.
        marker - marker of the data points.
        size - sizes of the different markers representing the data points. If contains 1 element, it will be used for all points.
        color - colors of the markers representing the data points. If contains 1 item, it will be used for all points.

    • Method Detail

      • getNormalXs

        public double[] getNormalXs​(double min,
                            double max)
        Query for the normalized X coordinates of the contained series.
        Parameters:
        min - absolute minimum value of the "display window".
        max - absolute maximum value of the "display window".
        Returns:
        array of screen-space normalized X coordinates of the data.

      • getNormalYs

        public double[] getNormalYs​(double min,
                            double max)
        Query for the normalized Y coordinates of the contained series.
        Parameters:
        min - absolute minimum value of the "display window".
        max - absolute maximum value of the "display window".
        Returns:
        array of screen-space normalized Y coordinates of the data.
